segments.text: I am dropping off my prescription to get it filled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can come back in twenty minutes , and it will be ready .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I couldn ’ t wait , could the prescription be mailed to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you can have it delivered or filled at any location in our HMO .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When should I take this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to take it at bedtime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I take this medicine on an empty stomach ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t mix alcohol with this medication , but you can take it with or without food .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are the side effects of this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might feel a little dizzy at first , but it should pass .
segments.speaker: S2
